homeHelpSubtitle: How to train your Sixth Sense?

about_article_text.1: The desire to distinguish between two kinds of perception (intuitive and logical) dates back to antiquity.
about_article_text.2: It has been proved in the modern world that developing your intuition is possible and it’s not very difficult!
about_article_text.3: How can I hear my inner voice?
about_article_text.4: Strong self-confidence is the basis for successful training of your Sixth Sense in the first place.

5.2: for intuition development with different levels of complexity.

about_article_text.6: The order of their use does not matter, the main thing is to practice on a daily basis.
about_article_text.7: Each exercise gives you experience points (%) and is displayed on the main application screen.
about_article_text.8: This index is calculated as the average number for seven days of practice (not calendar days).
about_article_text.10: Before pushing the button on the screen listen to your inner voice (it might be a visual or sound association).
about_article_text.11: Then - it’s very important – try to remember this feeling or association and push the button.
about_article_text.12: Compare with your result (correct or incorrect).
about_article_text.13: The main purpose of practice is to hear and distinguish the answers of your intuition.
about_article_text.14: Everyday practice during about 10 minutes will help you dramatically boost the effectiveness of your Sixth Feeling.
about_article_text.15: Intuition development – is persistence , practice and belief in yourself!
about_article_text.16: May the Force of Intuition be with you!

ex_four_of_nine_title: Listen to your sixth feeling - find out
ex_one_of_four_title: What does your Intuition tell you? Choose
